0.highlight: For three and a half decades since its founding, the Dordoi Association has become a symbol of stability, sustainable development and trust.
0.rest: By uniting business, creating jobs and contributing to the country's economic development, the Association consistently strengthens the positions of domestic entrepreneurship.

1.highlight: 35 years is a path of responsibility and dynamic movement forward,
1.suffix: based on the values of creation and development.

activities.title: Areas of Activity
activities.subtitle: Key areas where the Dordoi Association implements projects and contributes to the development of Kyrgyzstan

items.title: Trade and Logistics
items.description: The largest trade and logistics complex in Central Asia - an engine of the national economy and a symbol of Kyrgyz entrepreneurship.

items.title: Finance and Manufacturing
items.description: The economic backbone of the Association: microfinance, insurance, and investment companies creating jobs.

items.title: Education and Science
items.description: Investing in the future: supporting schools, universities, and educational centers, scholarship and grant programs.

items.title: Medicine and Healthcare
items.description: Caring for the nation's health: modern clinics, medical centers, and social projects to support the population.

items.title: Sports
items.description: A symbol of strength and national pride: the Dordoi football club, support for national sports and youth.

items.title: Culture and Tourism
items.description: Spiritual and cultural revival: supporting the film industry, theaters, cultural centers, and festivals.

items.title: Social Responsibility
items.description: Caring for people: building mosques, schools, sports complexes, helping those in need, and spiritual development.

news.title: News
news.subtitle: Current news, initiatives, and projects of the Dordoi Association

items.title: FC Dordoi becomes champion of Kyrgyzstan 2025
items.description: The team won the national title for the 11th time, confirming its status as the country's strongest club in an exciting final match.

items.title: The Association opened a new educational center in Osh region
items.description: The modern center is equipped with advanced equipment and will serve as a platform for developing talented youth in the region.

items.title: Dordoi and business partners from Turkey signed a memorandum of cooperation
items.description: The document will strengthen economic ties between the countries and create new opportunities for mutual investment and development.

items.title: Charity event in Batken: assistance to more than 500 families
items.description: The Association provided humanitarian support and essential goods to the affected regions.

items.title: Anniversary celebrations: 30 years of the Dordoi Association
items.description: Large-scale events dedicated to the organization's thirtieth anniversary brought together thousands of partners and friends.

items.title: Premiere of a national film in the Cinematika cinema network
items.description: The screening of the new Kyrgyz film attracted a record number of viewers and received rave reviews from critics.

history.title: Development
history.subtitle: Key milestones of our journey from foundation to the present day

milestones.title: Foundation of the Market
milestones.description: In December 1991, the legendary Dordoi market was founded, marking the beginning of a new era of entrepreneurship in Kyrgyzstan. This became the starting point for the development of private business in the country.

milestones.title: Formation of the Entrepreneurial Class
milestones.description: In the 1990s, Dordoi became a real 'business school' for thousands of Kyrgyzstanis. The first entrepreneurs were formed here, the basics of a market economy were mastered, and business traditions were laid.

milestones.title: Revival of Cinemas
milestones.description: The launch of the Cinematika network marked a new era in the country's cultural life. Modern cinemas were opened: 'Oktyabr', 'Ala-Too', 'Vefa', 'Cosmopark', 'Bishkek Park', 'Dordoi Plaza', and others.

milestones.title: World Bank Statistics
milestones.description: According to World Bank data, about 50,000 people were directly employed at Dordoi. This confirmed the significant contribution to the economy and employment.

milestones.title: Investment in Development
milestones.description: From 2010 to 2020, large-scale investments were made in various spheres: sports, education, medicine. This contributed to the socio-economic development of the regions.

milestones.title: Fight against COVID-19
milestones.description: During the difficult period of the pandemic, a significant contribution was made to the fight against coronavirus: 1 million soms in funds and 7.5 million soms in food and protective equipment.

milestones.title: Assistance to Batken
milestones.description: Large-scale assistance was provided to the Batken region: 20 tons of humanitarian aid were delivered and a kindergarten for 100 children was built.

milestones.title: Publication of the book 'Dordoi - 30 Years'
milestones.description: In honor of the 30th anniversary, the book 'Dordoi - 30 Years' was published, becoming a valuable archival material and chronicle of achievements. The book contains unique photographs and memories.

structure.subtitle: A comprehensive organization uniting key areas for maximum efficiency

trade.detailed: Our trade division specializes in the international distribution of premium quality goods. We have built a strong supply chain network ensuring efficient delivery and optimal conditions for our partners.

sport.name: Sports
sport.detailed: The sports division organizes large-scale events, develops sports infrastructure, and supports professional athletes.

culture.name: Culture
culture.detailed: The culture division implements projects in art, cultural heritage preservation, and supports creative initiatives.

persons.name: Askar Salymbekov
persons.bio: Visionary leader with over 20 years of experience in business development and strategic planning. Founded numerous successful enterprises in various industries.
persons.fullBio: Askar Salymbekov is a recognized leader in the business community with over 20 years of management experience. Under his leadership, the company has achieved significant growth and international recognition. He is the author of several innovative business models that have become industry standards in Central Asia.
persons.education: MBA Harvard Business School, Master of Economics KNU
achievements: Founded and scaled over 10 successful companies
Pioneer of innovative business models in Central Asia
Mentor to over 100 young entrepreneurs and business leaders
Awarded the national 'Business Leader of the Year' prize
Attracted over $100 million in investments to the region

persons.name: Samarbek Zhaparakunov
persons.bio: Experienced executive with expertise in operational excellence and digital transformation. Passionate about building high-performing teams and sustainable business practices.
persons.fullBio: Samarbek Zhaparakunov possesses deep knowledge in operational management and digital transformation. Under his leadership, the company underwent complete digitalization of business processes, leading to significant efficiency improvements and cost reductions.
persons.education: Master of Business Management, London Business School
achievements: Executed digital transformation of all business units
Implemented ESG initiatives across the organization

persons.name: Ainura Askarova
persons.bio: Financial strategist with 15+ years of experience in corporate finance and investment management. Specializes in financial planning and risk management strategies.
persons.fullBio: Ainura Askarova is a certified financial analyst with international experience at leading financial institutions. Her strategic vision and deep understanding of capital markets helped the company attract significant investments and optimize its financial structure.
persons.education: CFA, Master of Finance New York University

persons.name: Bakit Zhamankulov
persons.bio: Technology innovator with experience in software development and digital infrastructure. Focused on leveraging cutting-edge technologies for business growth.
persons.fullBio: Bakit Zhamankulov is an expert in technology and digital infrastructure. Under his technical leadership, the company developed proprietary technology platforms that became a competitive advantage in the market. He actively implements advanced technologies, including AI and machine learning.
achievements: Led development of proprietary technology platforms
Reduced infrastructure costs by 30% through optimization
Built and scaled engineering team from 10 to 50+ specialists

education.title: Education ‚Äî Opportunities for Everyone
education.subtitle: At ‚ÄúDordoy‚Äù we create conditions for high-quality education ‚Äî from schools to international programs.
education.intro: The ‚ÄúDordoy‚Äù Association actively invests in education, establishes educational institutions, develops projects, and supports youth in acquiring the knowledge and skills necessary for a successful life and career in the modern world.

includes.title: What the ‚ÄúEducation‚Äù direction includes
includes.specialists: training specialists in IT, business, medicine, and other in-demand fields

university.title: Salymbekov University ‚Äî Higher Education of International Standard
university.description: This university was founded with the support of the ‚ÄúDordoy‚Äù Association and the Askar Salymbekov Charitable Foundation to provide accessible and high-quality higher education with international standards.
university.feature1: education is conducted in Russian and English
university.feature2: programs in IT, business, and medicine are available
university.feature4: joint programs with foreign partners, such as Lincoln University (Malaysia), are implemented
university.tagline: This makes the university attractive to students from Kyrgyzstan and other countries.

international.title: International Collaborations and Colleges
international.description: The ‚ÄúDordoy‚Äù Association actively develops international educational projects ‚Äî for example, the International College of IT and Business, which operates jointly with Salymbekov University and foreign partners, including Lincoln University (Malaysia). Students receive dual diplomas of Kyrgyz and international standard and are prepared for the labor market with a high level of skills.

practical.title: Practical Benefits for Students
practical.benefit3: access to modern educational materials and laboratories
practical.benefit4: opportunity to obtain international diplomas and certificates

future.title: Why Education is an Investment in the Future
future.description: The ‚ÄúDordoy‚Äù Association sees education as a strategic direction for sustainable societal development. Thanks to educational projects:
future.impact2: the level of professionalism in key sectors increases
future.impact3: opportunities for career growth within the country and abroad are created

students.title: For Students and Applicants
students.benefit1: access to universities with international programs
students.benefit2: opportunity to study in Russian and English

parents.title: For Parents
parents.benefit1: children can get quality education near home

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
faq.question1: Where can I study within the ‚ÄúDordoy‚Äù educational projects?
faq.answer1: At Salymbekov University and the International College of IT and Business, as well as at partner universities.
faq.question2: Is it possible to obtain an international diploma?
faq.answer2: Yes ‚Äî through programs with foreign college partners.

hero.title: Education ‚Äî Knowledge, Experience, and International Opportunities
hero.subtitle: Modern educational programs, leading international standards, and practical training ‚Äî all gathered in a unified educational ecosystem of the ‚ÄúDordoy‚Äù Association.
hero.description: From medical education to IT and business ‚Äî we create the future for young leaders, professionals, and entrepreneurs.

about.title: Education ‚Äî A Path to International Success and Professional Growth
about.description1: The education sector is a powerful environment combining leading educational programs, international standards, practical training, and real career opportunities. Students and learners gain not only a diploma but also skills demanded globally: from medicine and IT to business and management.
about.description2: The educational ecosystem includes modern universities, specialized colleges, and international institutes, each offering unique programs and opportunities for professional development.
about.description3: Thanks to partnerships with leading foreign educational institutions and the use of advanced educational technologies, our graduates successfully build careers both in Kyrgyzstan and abroad.
about.highlight: Education at Dordoy is an investment in the future, opening doors to global opportunities and helping to shape a new generation of qualified specialists and leaders.

items.question: What areas of education are available at Dordoy?
items.answer: The Dordoy educational ecosystem includes medicine, IT, business, engineering, and humanities. All programs meet international standards.

items.question: Are diplomas recognized abroad?
items.answer: Yes, our institutions have international accreditation, and diplomas are recognized in most countries. Many programs are taught in English.

items.question: What opportunities for practical training are provided?
items.answer: Students undergo practice in modern laboratories, clinics, IT companies, and business structures in Kyrgyzstan and abroad.

hero.title: Dordoy Association ‚Äî everything for business and commercial activity
hero.subtitle: The Dordoy trade and market complex is a developed service ecosystem ‚Äî from logistics to a wide range of financial services.
hero.description: Thousands of entrepreneurs and customers use our services every day, ensuring stable growth and prosperity.

about.title: Services ‚Äî the heart of Dordoy‚Äôs everyday life
about.description1: The service sector at Dordoy market is one of the key components of its sustainable development. Dozens of services are concentrated here, serving entrepreneurs, wholesale buyers, employees, and market visitors on a daily basis.
about.description2: Dordoy‚Äôs services cover a wide range of areas ‚Äî from logistics and warehousing to financial and professional services. Thanks to this, the market functions like an independent city with its own infrastructure and rhythm of life.
about.description3: Each service is focused on speed, accessibility, and practicality ‚Äî qualities that are especially important in a large trade complex. In addition, members of the Dordoy Association provide high-quality services in other in-demand areas of the modern world.
about.highlight: Dordoy‚Äôs service sector is constantly evolving, adapting to new business and customer demands. Modern services, digital solutions, and professional specialists help entrepreneurs focus on what matters most ‚Äî growing their business.

directions.title: Service Areas
directions.subtitle: Comprehensive services for all business and everyday needs

items.title: Logistics Services
items.description: Delivery, warehousing, and transportation of goods across the country and beyond.

items.title: Repair and Maintenance
items.description: Professional repair of equipment, clothing, footwear, and other goods.

items.title: Financial Services
items.description: Banking operations, money transfers, and financial consulting.

items.title: Everyday Services
items.description: Hair salons, caf√©s, laundries, and other daily life services.

items.title: Digital Services
items.description: IT support, internet services, digital platforms, and technical assistance.

items.title: Consulting Services
items.description: Legal assistance, business consulting, and professional support.

items.question: What services are available at the Dordoy market?
items.answer: A full range of services is available at the market ‚Äî from logistics and repair to financial and consulting services. This makes Dordoy a fully functional city with its own infrastructure.

items.question: How do service centers operate?
items.answer: Service centers operate daily, providing high-quality repair and maintenance services. Experienced specialists use modern equipment and guarantee results.

items.question: Are financial services available?
items.answer: Yes, bank branches, currency exchange offices, money transfer points, and other financial services operate on the market territory for the convenience of entrepreneurs and customers.

hero.title: Production ‚Äî creating high-quality goods using modern technologies
hero.subtitle: Dordoy is not only a sales market, but also a powerful production center where goods are created for the entire country and beyond.
hero.description: Sewing workshops, processing, packaging, and manufacturing are all part of Dordoy‚Äôs large production community.

about.title: Production
about.description1: The entities of the Dordoy Association operating in the production sector contribute significantly to economic development. These companies produce goods for both the domestic market and export. Dordoy Trade and Market Complex has given a strong impulse to the development of light industry, where sewing workshops and other textile production sectors have reached an international level.
about.description2: Thousands of specialists work on creating high-quality products, combining traditional experience with modern technologies.
about.description3: Flexibility, speed, and adaptation to market needs define this sector. This is what makes it competitive and in demand.
about.highlight: Dordoy‚Äôs production enterprises are not just workplaces, but a community of people united by the pursuit of development, quality, and growth. Here, products go from idea to finished goods in the shortest possible time.

items.question: What types of production are represented at Dordoy?
items.answer: Various types of production are represented, ranging from garment and textile manufacturing to packaging production and logistics solutions. Light industry plays a key role.

items.question: How is product quality ensured?
items.answer: A multi-stage quality control system is in place ‚Äî from incoming raw material inspection to final product verification. Many enterprises hold international quality certifications.

items.question: What opportunities are available for business development?
items.answer: Dordoy provides all conditions for manufacturing business growth: affordable facilities, logistics capabilities, skilled workforce, and entrepreneurial support.

sports.intro: The Dordoi Association has been actively supporting sports development in Kyrgyzstan for many years. For Dordoi, sports is not only about achievements and victories, but also a contribution to public health, youth education and strong character formation.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
faq.subtitle: Answers to popular questions about Dordoi's sports activities

1.question: Is children's sports supported?
1.answer: Yes, the Dordoi Association pays great attention to youth and mass sports programs, creating conditions for the sports development of children and teenagers.

2.question: Is it possible to become a partner of sports projects?
2.answer: Yes, cooperation is possible in agreement with the administration of the Dordoi Association. We are open to partnership in the implementation of sports and social projects.

culture.subtitle: Spaces for life, traditions, creativity, and leisure
culture.intro: Dordoi Association pays special attention to the development of culture and creating conditions for quality leisure time. We support cultural initiatives, preserve national traditions, and create modern spaces where people can relax, socialize, and spend time with family.
culture.introConclusion: Culture and leisure are an important part of sustainable societal development and quality of life.
culture.directionsTitle: What does the 'Culture and Leisure' direction include
culture.directionsDescription: Dordoi's activities in this direction cover:
directions: Support for national traditions and art
Creation of public and recreational spaces
Development of trade and entertainment complexes
Organization of family and urban leisure
culture.mainDirectionsDescription: Key areas of activity in culture and leisure

events.title: Cultural Events and Projects
events.description: Dordoi regularly supports and organizes cultural events aimed at preserving and popularizing the history, traditions, and values of the Kyrgyz people.

traditions.title: Preservation of Traditions and National Heritage
traditions.description: One of the priorities is supporting national culture and spiritual values through cultural projects and public initiatives.

spaces.title: Public Spaces and Recreation Areas
spaces.description: Comfortable recreation spaces are created on Dordoi's premises and related projects.

entertainment.title: Shopping and Entertainment Centers as Leisure Places

impacts: Contributes to spiritual and emotional development
culture.socialResponsibility: Dordoi Association views culture and leisure as an important part of corporate social responsibility.
culture.benefitsDescription: Advantages for different categories of participants
culture.faqDescription: Answers to popular questions about cultural events and leisure

events.question: What cultural events does Dordoi support?
events.answer: Festivals, exhibitions, concerts, and public events aimed at developing culture and traditions.

family.question: Are there places for family leisure?
family.answer: Yes, shopping and entertainment complexes and public spaces are suitable for family leisure.

organization.question: Can cultural events be organized at Dordoi venues?
organization.answer: Yes, in coordination with the administration.

hero.title: Promoting a healthy lifestyle and sports development -
hero.description: Sports are an important element of modern society.

about.title: About Us
about.description1: Since its foundation, the ‚ÄúDordoy‚Äù Association has made a significant contribution to preserving, reviving, and developing various sports in Kyrgyzstan.
about.description2: The national sport ‚ÄúKok-Boru,‚Äù football, wrestling, hockey, and other sports have received a strong boost thanks to our association‚Äôs activities. Here, sports are seen not only as physical activity but also as a tool for fostering discipline, team spirit, and responsibility.
about.description3: Dordoy creates conditions for sports development at different levels ‚Äî from amateur and mass forms to professional teams representing the community both domestically and internationally.

professional.title: Football Club ‚ÄúDordoy‚Äù
professional.description1: The football club ‚ÄúDordoy‚Äù holds a central place in Dordoy‚Äôs sports life ‚Äî one of the most famous and successful clubs in Kyrgyzstan. It symbolizes stability, a winning spirit, and a professional approach to sports.
professional.description2: FC ‚ÄúDordoy‚Äù builds a positive image of Dordoy while promoting the values of sports, teamwork, and striving for results.

fcRoles.youthSupport: Support for youth and beginner athletes
fcRoles.communityEngagement: Engaging the community in sports life

fcRole.title: FC ‚ÄúDordoy‚Äù Role in the Sports Ecosystem
fcRole.description: The football club ‚ÄúDordoy‚Äù plays an important social and motivational role.
fcRole.successMessage: The club's successes become a shared achievement and a source of pride for the entire Dordoy community.

massiveSport.title: Mass and Amateur Sports
massiveSport.description: Alongside professional sports, a mass sports environment is actively developing at Dordoy.
massiveSport.sportsInitiatives: Sports initiatives for employees and entrepreneurs
massiveSport.conclusionMessage: This makes sports accessible and meaningful for a wide range of people.

events.title: Sports Events and Initiatives
events.description: Various sports events are regularly held on Dordoy grounds.
events.conclusionMessage: These events strengthen team spirit and create an active, lively sports atmosphere.

conclusion.title: Sports at Dordoy ‚Äî Moving Forward

missionAbout.missionStatement: We create conditions for mature entrepreneurial environment and invest in country's human potential

commitment.description: Every day we work to bring these values to life through our projects and initiatives

missionAbout.footerText: Join our mission and become part of the changes

values.title: Hard Work
values.description: Value hard work and persistence as foundation of any achievement and success
values.detailed: We believe that constant improvement and diligence are the engine of progress. Every team member contributes to the common cause, and we are proud of our work ethic.

values.title: Unity
values.description: Work as one team, supporting each other and achieving common goals together
values.detailed: Team cohesion is our key asset. We create environment where everyone feels supported and can maximize their potential.

values.title: Creation
values.description: Create projects that change people's lives for better and develop country's economy
values.detailed: Our work aims to create long-term value. We build not just projects, but foundation for society's future development.

values.title: Responsibility
values.description: Acknowledge our responsibility to society, partners and future generations
values.detailed: We take responsibility for every decision made and its consequences. Our reputation is built on reliability and transparency.

values.title: Community Support
values.description: Actively participate in social projects and support local communities
values.detailed: We invest in local community development, support educational initiatives and contribute to job creation.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: Constantly seek new approaches and technologies to improve our activities
values.detailed: Innovation is not just a word for us, but a mindset. We constantly research new technologies and methods to improve our processes.

press.title: News
press.subtitle: Current news, events and official company announcements

news.title: New Sustainable Development Project
news.lead: Launch of eco-friendly production using solar energy
news.fullText:
The company announces the launch of a new environmental project aimed at reducing carbon footprint and implementing sustainable practices in the production process.

The project includes installation of 5 MW solar panels, water recycling system and transition to biodegradable materials. This is expected to reduce CO2 emissions by 40% within the next year.

news.title: Technological Partnership with University
news.lead: Signing agreement for joint research in artificial intelligence
news.fullText:
The company has concluded a strategic partnership with a leading technical university for joint work on projects in artificial intelligence and machine learning.

Within the framework of cooperation, a research center will be established where students and company employees will work on innovative projects. The first joint project will be development of a demand forecasting system using neural networks.

news.title: New Trade Complex Opening
news.lead: Grand opening of modern trade complex with participation of city administration representatives
news.fullText:
December 15, 2023 marked a significant event for our city - the opening of a new 10,000 m¬≤ trade complex. The opening ceremony was attended by the city mayor, business community representatives and local residents.

The complex includes 150 trading spaces, modern parking for 300 cars and visitor recreation areas. The project was implemented considering the latest retail trends and will create over 500 new jobs.

news.title: Charity Marathon for Children
news.lead: Company organized annual charity marathon in support of orphanages
news.fullText:
On December 10, 2023, the annual charity marathon organized with support from our company took place. The event gathered over 1000 participants and helped raise funds for orphanage children.

All collected funds will be directed towards facility repairs, purchase of educational materials and organization of developmental activities for children.

news.title: Logistics Center Launch
news.lead: Modern logistics center with automated management system commissioned
news.fullText:
On December 5, 2023, a new logistics center equipped with modern equipment and automated warehouse management system was launched.

The 15,000 m¬≤ center will optimize inventory turnover and reduce delivery times for our partners. Implementation of modern technologies will increase efficiency of logistics operations by 40%.

news.title: Cooperation Memorandum Signing
news.lead: Strategic partnership concluded with leading national university
news.fullText:
On December 1, 2023, a cooperation memorandum was signed between our company and the National University. The document provides for joint work in personnel training, scientific research and implementation of educational programs.

Within the cooperation framework, internship programs for students, joint research and professional courses are planned.

news.title: Corporate Policy Update
news.fullText:
On November 25, 2023, the updated company environmental policy was approved, aimed at reducing carbon footprint and implementing sustainable business practices.

Main policy directions include transition to renewable energy sources, implementation of waste recycling system and resource consumption reduction. The company plans to achieve carbon neutrality by 2030.

news.title: Corporate Employee Celebration
news.lead: Annual corporate celebration dedicated to company anniversary held
news.fullText:
On November 20, 2023, the annual corporate celebration dedicated to the company's 32nd anniversary took place. The event gathered over 2000 employees and their families.

The celebration program included concerts, sports competitions, contests and awards for best employees. Special attention was given to company veterans who made significant contributions to organization development.

partnersProjects.title: Partnerships and Projects
partnersProjects.subtitle: Strategic cooperation with international partners for sustainable development and economic growth

projects.title: Joint Industrial Zone with Turkey
projects.description: Creation of modern industrial zone for production potential development and export capacity
projects.fullDescription: Large-scale project to create a modern industrial zone including production facilities, logistics centers and research laboratories. The project aims to develop export potential and create high-tech jobs. Partnership with leading Turkish companies allows implementation of advanced technologies and international management standards.
projects.impact: Creation of 500+ jobs, export potential development

projects.title: Textile Industry Investments with China
projects.description: Modern textile factories with full production cycle and export orientation
projects.fullDescription: Joint investment project to create modern textile enterprises with full production cycle. Implementation of advanced technologies and international quality standards. The project includes construction of spinning, weaving and sewing factories, as well as a training center.
projects.impact: 40% export growth, creation of sustainable textile industry

projects.title: Vocational Education Program with GIZ
projects.description: Development of vocational education system and training qualified personnel for industry
projects.fullDescription: Comprehensive program for modernization of vocational education system in cooperation with German Society for International Cooperation (GIZ). Includes updating curricula, equipping workshops with modern equipment and teacher training.
projects.impact: Improving vocational education quality, reducing youth unemployment

projects.title: Educational Exchanges with KOICA
projects.description: Academic mobility program and experience exchange between Kyrgyzstan and South Korea
projects.fullDescription: Large-scale educational exchange and academic mobility program implemented with support of Korea International Cooperation Agency (KOICA). The program covers students, graduate students and teachers, facilitating knowledge and technology transfer.
projects.impact: Strengthening academic ties, improving higher education quality

projects.title: SME Development with USAID
projects.description: Comprehensive support for small and medium businesses through access to financing and consultations
projects.fullDescription: Small and medium business support program implemented with technical assistance from USAID. Includes providing microloans, business consultations, trainings and mentor support. Special attention to women entrepreneurs and startups.
projects.impact: Economic diversification, entrepreneurship support, job creation

projects.title: Turkish-Kyrgyz Educational Center
projects.description: Modern educational center for training specialists in IT and engineering
projects.fullDescription: Joint project to create multifunctional educational center specializing in IT specialists and engineers training. The center is equipped with modern computer classes, laboratories and coworking zones for project work.
projects.impact: IT ecosystem development, training highly qualified personnel for digital economy

projects.title: Solar Power Plant Construction with EBRD
projects.description: Largest solar power plant in Central Asia with 100 MW capacity
projects.fullDescription: Ambitious project to build solar power plant in partnership with European Bank for Reconstruction and Development. The station uses advanced technologies and contributes to diversification of country's energy sector.
projects.impact: Sustainable energy supply, reducing dependence on imported electricity

projects.title: Irrigation Systems Modernization with ADB
projects.description: Comprehensive modernization of water supply and irrigation systems in rural regions
projects.fullDescription: Asian Development Bank project for irrigation infrastructure modernization, including construction of new canals, installation of modern irrigation systems and training farmers in water-saving technologies.
projects.impact: Improving water use efficiency, sustainable agricultural development

upcoming.title: Business Conference "Investments in Industry"
upcoming.theme: Attracting investments to Kyrgyzstan's industrial sector
upcoming.description: Specialized conference dedicated to presentation of investment projects and establishing partnership links between investors and industrial enterprises
upcoming.fullDescription: Investments in Industry conference provides unique opportunity for industrial enterprises to present their projects to potential investors. The program includes: pitch sessions, individual consultations and meetings with international investment funds.

archive.title: International Conference on Sustainable Development 2023
archive.theme: Green economy and environmental initiatives in business
archive.description: Conference dedicated to implementation of sustainable development principles in business processes and environmental innovations
archive.fullDescription: The conference gathered sustainable development experts to discuss green technologies, environmental standards and corporate social responsibility. Participants received practical tools for implementing ESG principles.
outcomes: 5 pilot projects on green technologies launched
testimonials: Excellent organization and high level of speakers. Lots of useful information for our business.
The conference helped us find partners for implementing solar panels at our production.

archive.title: Regional Small and Medium Business Forum
archive.theme: Support and development of SMEs in Kyrgyzstan's regions
archive.description: Forum aimed at discussing problems and prospects of small and medium business development in the country's regions
archive.fullDescription: SME Forum became a platform for dialogue between entrepreneurs, government agencies and international donors. Main topics: access to financing, marketing and export opportunities.
testimonials: Very useful event for regional business. Learned about new support programs.
Found suppliers from neighboring regions. Great opportunities for cooperation.

archive.title: Business Conference "Export Opportunities"
archive.location: Bishkek, Chamber of Commerce and Industry of Kyrgyzstan
archive.theme: Expanding export potential of Kyrgyz enterprises
archive.description: Specialized conference on issues of Kyrgyz companies entering international markets and developing export activities
archive.fullDescription: Export Opportunities conference provided Kyrgyz companies with information about international market requirements, certification procedures and logistics solutions. Special attention was paid to EAEU and Chinese markets.
speakers: Gulnara Abdraimova - Chamber of Commerce and Industry
testimonials: The conference opened new horizons for our business. Already negotiating with partners from Kazakhstan.
Professional consultations on product certification. Very useful for exporters.

business.title: Business and Trade ‚Äî Dordoi Opportunities
business.subtitle: Largest trade hub in Central Asia ‚Äî markets, wholesale, logistics and business support.

hero.title: Dordoi ‚Äî Market Where Businesses Are Born
hero.subtitle: A unique ecosystem for entrepreneurs: from retail spaces to wholesale supplies and export support.
hero.introduction: Since 1991, Dordoi has united trade, wholesale and services ‚Äî a place where entrepreneurs find goods, partners, and infrastructure for growth.

description.title: What is 'Business and Trade'
description.short: Dordoi is not just a market: it's a large ecosystem for trade and business where everything is sold ‚Äî from clothing and electronics to auto parts and food. Buyers come from neighboring countries, and entrepreneurs work directly with foreign suppliers.
description.long:
Dordoi started operations in 1991 and over several decades has transformed into an international trade and market hub. On its territory there are clothing, wholesale, retail and food markets; warehouse and vehicle fleet complexes operate, entrepreneurs from Kyrgyzstan and neighboring countries buy and bring goods at affordable prices.

The structure includes unique wholesale platforms (e.g., 'Dordoi-Auto Parts'), where goods come directly from manufacturers in China, Turkey, Russia, Korea and Europe, allowing to reduce prices for end customers.

The complex is accompanied by developed infrastructure: rental of trading spaces and warehouses, bank service points, electronic payments, 24/7 security and logistics park. All this makes Dordoi a convenient center for trade and export.

stats.title: Statistics and Facts
stats.footnote: Creates jobs and entrepreneurial school for several generations of businessmen.

wholesale.title: Wholesale Trade and International Supplies
wholesale.description: Wholesalers work directly with manufacturers (China, Turkey, Russia, Korea, EU). This provides competitive prices and wide assortment.

tailor.title: Tailor Shop Grown into Exporter
tailor.description: How the market helped find foreign partners.

autoparts.title: Small Auto Parts Supplier Became Wholesaler

wholesaler.title: From Small Kiosk to Major Supplier
wholesaler.description: Business growth story on the Dordoi platform.

rental.title: For Tenants
rental.steps: How to rent a space (3 steps):

rent.question: How to rent a trading space?
rent.answer: 1. Choose suitable zone on the website or in person. 2. Fill out rental application. 3. Provide necessary documents. 4. Sign contract and pay deposit.

documents.question: What documents are needed for wholesale?
documents.answer: For wholesale trade you need: business registration certificate (Sole Proprietor/LLC), licenses for certain types of goods, quality certificates, import documents.

export.question: Is there export support?
export.answer: Yes, Dordoi has an international relations department that helps with export operations, customs clearance and finding foreign partners.

payment.question: How to pay rent/services?
payment.answer: Payment is available through bank cash desks on site, bank transfers, electronic terminals and online payments.

cta.title: Start Your Business at Dordoi Today!
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of successful entrepreneurs

culture_leisure.subtitle: Spaces for life, traditions, creativity and leisure
culture_leisure.intro: Dordoi Association pays special attention to cultural development and creating conditions for quality rest. We support cultural initiatives, preserve national traditions, and create modern spaces where people can relax, communicate and spend time with family.
culture_leisure.introConclusion: Culture and leisure are important parts of sustainable social development and quality of life.
culture_leisure.directionsTitle: What Culture and Leisure direction includes
culture_leisure.directionsDescription: Dordoi's activities in this direction cover:
directions: Support for national traditions and arts
Creation of public and recreational spaces
Development of trade and entertainment complexes
Organization of family and urban leisure
culture_leisure.mainDirectionsDescription: Key areas of activity in culture and leisure

events.title: Cultural Events and Projects
events.description: Dordoi regularly supports and organizes cultural events aimed at preserving and promoting the history, traditions and values of the Kyrgyz people.

traditions.title: Preservation of Traditions and National Heritage
traditions.description: One of the priorities is supporting national culture and spiritual values through cultural projects and public initiatives.

spaces.title: Public Spaces and Recreation Areas
spaces.description: Comfortable rest spaces are created on Dordoi facilities territory and in related projects.

entertainment.title: Trade and Entertainment Centers as Leisure Places
entertainment.description: Modern trade and entertainment complexes that combine shopping, restaurants and entertainment.

events.question: What cultural events does Dordoi support?
events.answer: Festivals, exhibitions, concerts and public events aimed at developing culture and traditions.

organization.answer: Yes, in coordination with the administration.
